import{useMutation}from'react-query';import{postUploadFiles}from'@/apis/upload/postUploadFiles';// 경로를 적절하게 수정해주세요.
export default function usePostUploadFiles(){return useMutation(async files=>{const formData=new FormData();for(let i=0;i<files.length;i++){formData.append('images',files[i]);}return postUploadFiles({formData});});}
